biotools.summary:
Multi-contrast pathway enrichment for multi-omics and single-cell profiling data.

This repo contains code to reproduce analysis presented in the mitch paper. The Mitch R package can be found at https://github.com/markziemann/Mitch.

Multi-Contrast Gene Set Enrichment Analysis.

mitch is an R package for multi-contrast enrichment analysis.
